content:
You're welcome! I'm excited for you to try out the apple wood chips with your chicken thighs. Remember to take your time, monitor the temperature, and don't be afraid to experiment with different smoke times and flavors.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to reach out. Otherwise, I hope you enjoy the process and savor the delicious flavors of your smoked chicken thighs!

Don't forget to try out that Korean-Style BBQ Sauce recipe I shared earlier, and let me know how it turns out. I'm always here to help and love hearing about your BBQ adventures!

Happy grilling and smoking, and I'll catch you on the flip side!
